subsets.name: hcd_pos_stepped
subsets.expression: meta.get('fragmentation_method') == 'hcd' and meta.get('ionMode') == 'positive' and meta.get('CE') in ['45.0', 'stepped20,45,70ev(absolute)']

subsets.name: hcd_neg_stepped
subsets.expression: meta.get('fragmentation_method') == 'hcd' and meta.get('ionMode') == 'negative' and meta.get('CE') in ['45.0', 'stepped20,45,70ev(absolute)']
